name: 1BeatHeart
description:
1BeatHeart is an adventure game by △○□× (Miwashiba) made in WOLF RPG Editor. It's a story-oriented game with investigation and puzzle-solving.

It's also the "spinoff" sequel to 1bitHeart, and thus contains some spoilers for it.

Misane and Nanase, now both detectives in training, stay at a resort hotel.
However, sure enough, they're given no time to relax.
Because numerous incidents begin to take place there...
